sentences.english: Remove all fetters, what excuse not happy?

sentences.english: S777 sheds its skin spinner to make room for man.

sentences.english: He took off his thick black coat and threw it to Harry.
sentences.chinese: 他褪下他的厚重的黑大衣丟給哈利。
